name: Florges
author: 5ban Graphics
flavor_text: It claims exquisite flower gardens as its territory, and it obtains power from basking in the energy emitted by flowering plants.

attacks.name: Brilliant Search
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 3 cards and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Petal Blizzard
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
